questions.frontContent: Which JavaScript framework is currently the most widely used for building modern web applications?
What is the name of the popular utility-first CSS framework that simplifies styling web applications?
What does the Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) metric measure in web performance?
options: The time it takes for the first byte to be received
The time it takes for the largest visible element to render
The time it takes for JavaScript to fully load
The time it takes for all images to be downloaded
questions.backContent: The time it takes for the largest visible element to render

questions.frontContent: What is the standard Git workflow when working on a new feature in a collaborative project?
options: Work directly on the main branch
Create a new branch, commit changes, push, and create a Pull Request
Make changes and push directly without review
Use FTP to upload code manually
questions.backContent: Create a new branch, commit changes, push, and create a Pull Request

questions.frontContent: Which backend runtime is commonly used with React and modern JavaScript applications?
Which of the following is a modern ES6+ JavaScript feature?
What is the main purpose of Content Security Policy (CSP) in web security?
What is the recommended way to improve loading speed in React applications?
options: Use server-side rendering (SSR) or static site generation (SSG)
Load all JavaScript files at once
Use larger images for better quality
questions.backContent: Use server-side rendering (SSR) or static site generation (SSG)

questions.frontContent: What database is commonly used in full-stack JavaScript applications?
Which of these frontend technologies is gaining popularity for state management in React?
